alert.note: Alert for Inland Hillsborough; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 6:16PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hillsborough and west central Polk Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 616 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hillsborough River State Park, or 8 miles east of Temple Terrace, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Lakeland, Plant City, Temple Terrace, Brandon, Fish Hawk, Lakeland Linder Airport, Hillsborough River State Park, Medulla, Riverview, Valrico, Seffner, Mango, Thonotosassa, Dover, Plant City Airport, Tampa Executive Airport, Boyette, Winston, and Lettuce Lake Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
